titleStmt.title: The rocke of religion. Christ, not Peter As it was deliuered in certaine sermons vpon Math. 16. ver. 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 19, & 20. Summarily contracted out of that which was more largely handled in the parish of S. Anthonline by George Close the younger, one of the readers there.
titleStmt.author: Close, George.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by A. Mathewes for Mathew Law,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
